rows.label: qev075503_MSG0001
rows.name: Apologies for asking you all the way out here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075503_MSG0002
rows.name:
After what seems to be eons spent in training,
I have mastered my grandfather's ultimate technique.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075503_MSG0003
rows.name:
I need space for it, though—training in cramped spaces
back in the city only resulted in a mess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075503_MSG0004
rows.name:
Are you ready for battle, then? I swear you do not face
the same Gi Zang that you fought last time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075503_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you need to prepare first.

rows.label: qev075503_MSG0005
rows.name:
This technique beat back everyone who ever faced it.
You're in for a hell of a show![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075503_MSG0006
rows.name:
Very well. But hurry! I am eager to show you what I
have learned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075503_MSG0007
rows.name: Ha ha ha! Come at me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075503_MSG0008
rows.name:
I am Gi Zang, last survivor of the Hundred Hellions
and inheritor of my master's sword. I draw it—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075503_MSG0009
rows.name: Oh, damn! You still have my sword![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075503_MSG0010
rows.name:
Heh. That's rather embarrassing. Well, I'm finally ready
to take it back, if you don't mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075503_MSG0011
rows.name:
I am Gi Zang, last survivor of the Hundred Hellions
and inheritor of my master's sword. I draw it now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075503_MSG0012
rows.name:
I shall show you the result of all my training here on
Mira. Everything I have learned from you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075503_MSG0013
rows.name:
NrrrrroooaaAAAAH! Seethe and fission, flesh and soul!
Behold the Hundred Hellions ultimate technique...
Threefold Thunderflash!

rows.label: qev075503_MSG0014
rows.name:
Ha ha ha! Every one of these is ME!
Now test your strength against us all![ST:wait ]
